meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Orzalli David Brown Patrick Geary Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6657.

td.p: Sarah Orzalli, a project coordinator from Chicago, Illinois
David Brown, a fundraising intern from Palo Alto, California
Patrick Geary, a preloader from Sheridan, Wyoming (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,800)

tr.td: THE AMERICAS
(Alex: Next, we're dealing with the Biblical Jacob...)
A SON OF JACOB
REALITY CHECKS
A USEFUL CATEGORY
THANKS A LATTE
NO BIG "E"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Mount Fairweather, the tallest in this Canadian province, is also partly in Alaska')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Patrick
David
Sarah

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Patrick
David
Sarah
(Alex: We are going to get some help in the first category of the Double Jeopardy! Round from CNN correspondents, and the category is...)
THE CALENDAR
BARD "M"EN
(Alex: Each correct response beginning with the letter "M".)
NAME THE SONG
ARCHAEOLOGY
WITHIN LIMITATIONS
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that is made up of some of the letters in the word "limitations".)

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Patrick

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Laughing at David\'s response] I love your sense of humor, but if you had picked a different last name, for instance Hoffman, you\'d have come up with [*].)
SarahWho are the Fondas
$2,900
PatrickWho is Fonda?
$6,799
DavidWho were Jerry & Daniel Day Lewis?
$0
Dustin Hoffman & Philip Seymour Hoffman')

tr.td: OSCAR-WINNING ACTORS
They're the only 2 Best Actor winners with the same last name; one was a winner for 1979 & 1988, the other for 2005
Patrick
David
Sarah

New champion: $22,200
2nd place: $2,000

David
Sarah

(including 1 DD),
3 W

(including 2 DDs),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
